iti93:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti93:2.3: The fires of greed, hate, and delusion.
iti93:3.1: “The fire of greed burns a mortal,
iti93:3.3: while, fallen in the fire of hate,
iti93:4.1: and, bewildered by the fire of delusion,
iti93:4.2: they miss the teaching of the noble ones.
iti93:4.4: people are caught up in substantial reality.
iti93:5.1: They fill the ranks of hell,
iti93:6.1: But as to those committed day and night
iti93:6.2: to the teaching of the Buddha:
iti93:6.3: they extinguish the fire of greed,
iti93:7.2: extinguish the fire of hate with love;
iti93:7.3: and the fire of delusion with the wisdom
iti93:9.1: Seers of the noble truths, knowledge masters,
iti93:9.3: directly know the ending of rebirth,
iti93:9.4: they come not back to future lives.”
iti93:10.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
